title: Naruto: Akaki Yotsuba no Clover wo Sagase
alternative_title: Naruto: Find the Crimson Four-leaf Clover!
description: The grandson of the 3rd Hokage, Konohamaru, finally has a crush on a girl, but he has a big problem she is soon to be moving away from the hidden leaf village. Konohamaru trying to make her stay seeks out the legendary crimson four-leaf clover, which is rumored to grant one wish.
